summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Gute Tat app features: countdown timer (24h from 06:00-05:59), Ramadan mode with toggle, golden styling, Ramadan-specific deeds, and toast notifications. All features working perfectly.
passed_tests: Countdown displays correct format (HH:MM:SS) and shows time until 06:00
Ramadan toggle switch found and functional
Ramadan mode activation shows 'Ramadan Mubarak!' toast
Ramadan badge appears with correct format 'Tag 1 von 30'
Logo changes from 'Gute Tat' to 'Ramadan' when activated
Ramadan-specific deed displayed: 'Erneuere heute bewusst deine Niyya f√ºr das Fasten'
Source reference still shown in both modes
Golden button styling in Ramadan mode (rgb(245, 158, 11))
Deed completion works with appropriate toast messages
Ramadan mode deactivation restores normal mode correctly
Calendar/history functionality preserved with month navigation
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
